title: Buffer Mix and Dilution
author: Opentrons
description:
Serial dilution in a 96-deep-well plate.
Dilutes across 7 rows - the first row will just contain undiluted samples.
Samples begin in 2mL tubes in a tube rack.
process:
Transfer buffer to all wells, except row 1 on plate.
Transfer 8 tube samples to row 1 on plate, and mix.
Dilution transfers with mixing of rows after each transfer.

markdown.title: Buffer Mix and Dilution
markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.description:
Serial dilution in a 96-deep-well plate.

Dilutes across 7 rows - the first row will just contain undiluted samples.

Samples begin in 2mL tubes in a tube rack.
markdown.process:
1. Transfer buffer to all wells, except row 1 on plate.
2. Transfer 8 tube samples to row 1 on plate, and mix.
3. Dilution transfers with mixing of rows after each transfer.
